"Power Level: Part 2":
"Each item raises your Power Level by a different amount. This is how Power Level breaks down at Lv.25:

・Each level you gain increases your Power Level by about 13-20
\u3000(Higher levels raise Power Level more)
・Each Class Skill you learn, from your Main Class or your Sub Class, increases your Power Level by 3"

"・Each level of your weapon's Potential raises your Power Level by 10
・Each Special Ability added to your equipment increases your Power Level by about 2-10
\u3000(Different Special Abilities increase by different amounts)
・Every 1 point of ATP your weapon gains increases your Power Level by about 1
・Every 1 point of DFP your armor gains increases your Power Level by about 0.5"

"The N-Grinders and N-Meseta you need to upgrade your weapons and armor can be obtained in the following ways:

・N-Grinders:
\u3000Destroying the Item Containers [Green] that you find in the field
・N-Meseta:
\u3000Selling Alpha Reactors found in the field, completing Weekly Tasks, etc."
